00035 #include "UntangleBetaQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00037 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00038 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00039 
00040 using namespace Mesquite;
00041 
00042 static inline void untangle_function_2d( double beta,
00043                                          const Vector3D temp_vec[],
00044                                          size_t e_ind,
00045                                          PatchData &pd, 
00046                                          double &fval, 
00047                                          MsqError &err)
00048 {
00049   Vector3D surface_normal;
00050   pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e_ind,surface_normal,err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00051   Vector3D cross_vec=temp_vec[0]*temp_vec[1];
00052     //cout<<"\nsurface_normal "<<surface_normal;
00053     //cout<<"\cross_vec "<<cross_vec;
00054   double temp_var=cross_vec.length();
00055   if(cross_vec%surface_normal<0.0){
00056     temp_var*=-1;
00057   }
00058   temp_var -= beta;
00059     //cout<<"temp_var == "<<temp_var;
00060   fval=0.0;
00061   if(temp_var<0.0){
00062      fval=fabs(temp_var)-temp_var;
00063   }
00064     //  cout<<"\nfval == "<<fval<<"  e_ind "<<e_ind;
00065 }
00066 
00067 static inline void untangle_function_3d( double beta,
00068                                          const Vector3D temp_vec[],
00069                                          double &fval )
00070 {
00071   double temp_var=temp_vec[0]%(temp_vec[1]*temp_vec[2]);
00072   temp_var-=beta;
00073   fval=0.0;
00074   if(temp_var<0.0){
00075     fval=fabs(temp_var)-temp_var;
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00083 UntangleBetaQualityMetric::UntangleBetaQualityMetric(double bet)
00084   : AveragingQM( RMS ),
00085     mBeta( bet )
00086   { }
00087 
00088 std::string UntangleBetaQualityMetric::get_name() const
00089   { return "Untangle Beta"; }
00090 
00091 int UntangleBetaQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00092   { return 1; }
00093 
00094 bool UntangleBetaQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00095                                           size_t e_ind, 
00096                                           double& fval, 
00097                                           MsqError& err )
00098 {
00099   
00100   double met_vals[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00101   fval=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00102   const MsqMeshEntity* element = &pd.element_by_index(e_ind);
00103   const size_t* v_i = element->get_vertex_index_array();
00104     //only 3 temp_vec will be sent to untangle calculator, but the
00105     //additional vector3Ds may be needed during the calculations
00106   Vector3D temp_vec[5];
00107   const MsqVertex *vertices=pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108   EntityTopology type = element->get_element_type();
00109   switch(type){
00110     case TRIANGLE:
00111       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00112       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00113         //make relative to equilateral
00114       temp_vec[1]=((2*temp_vec[2])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00115       untangle_function_2d( mBeta, temp_vec, e_ind, pd, fval, err );
00116       break;
00117     case QUADRILATERAL:
00118       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00119       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00120       untangle_function_2d( mBeta, temp_vec, e_ind, pd, met_vals[0], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00121       
00122       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00123       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00124       untangle_function_2d( mBeta, temp_vec, e_ind, pd, met_vals[1], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00125       
00126       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00127       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00128       untangle_function_2d( mBeta, temp_vec, e_ind, pd, met_vals[2], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00129       
00130       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00131       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00132       untangle_function_2d( mBeta, temp_vec, e_ind, pd, met_vals[3], err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00133       fval=average_metrics(met_vals, 4, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00134       break;
00135     case TETRAHEDRON:
00136       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00137       temp_vec[3]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00138       temp_vec[4]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00139         //transform to equilateral tet
00140       temp_vec[1]=((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])/MSQ_SQRT_THREE;
00141       temp_vec[2]=((3*temp_vec[4])-temp_vec[0]-temp_vec[3])/
00142         (MSQ_SQRT_THREE*MSQ_SQRT_TWO);
00143       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec,fval );
00144       break;
00145     case HEXAHEDRON:
00146         //transform to v_i[0]
00147       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00148       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00149       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00150       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[0] );
00151       
00152       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00153       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00154       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00155       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[1] );
00156       
00157       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00158       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00159       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00160       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[2] );
00161       
00162       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00163       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00164       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00165       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[3] );
00166       
00167       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00168       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00169       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00170       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec,met_vals[4] );
00171       
00172       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00173       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00174       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00175       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[5] );
00176       
00177       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00178       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00179       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00180       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[6] );
00181       
00182       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00183       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00184       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00185       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[7] );
00186       fval=average_metrics(met_vals, 8, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00187       break;
00188     case PYRAMID:
00189       for (unsigned i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00190         temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]] - vertices[v_i[i]];
00191         temp_vec[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]] - vertices[v_i[i]];
00192         temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[4]] - vertices[v_i[i]];
00193         temp_vec[2] = (4*temp_vec[3] - temp_vec[0] - temp_vec[1])/
00194                       (2.0 - MSQ_SQRT_TWO);
00195         untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[i] );
00196       }
00197       fval = average_metrics( met_vals, 4, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00198       break;
00199     case PRISM:
00200       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[1]] - vertices[v_i[0]];
00201       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[2]] - vertices[v_i[0]];
00202       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00203       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[3]] - vertices[v_i[0]];
00204       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[0] );
00205     
00206       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[2]] - vertices[v_i[1]];
00207       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[0]] - vertices[v_i[1]];
00208       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00209       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[4]] - vertices[v_i[1]];
00210       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[1] );
00211     
00212       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[0]] - vertices[v_i[2]];
00213       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[1]] - vertices[v_i[2]];
00214       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00215       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[5]] - vertices[v_i[2]];
00216       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[2] );
00217     
00218       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[5]] - vertices[v_i[3]];
00219       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[4]] - vertices[v_i[3]];
00220       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00221       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[0]] - vertices[v_i[3]];
00222       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[3] );
00223     
00224       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[3]] - vertices[v_i[4]];
00225       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[5]] - vertices[v_i[4]];
00226       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00227       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[1]] - vertices[v_i[4]];
00228       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[4] );
00229     
00230       temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[4]] - vertices[v_i[5]];
00231       temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[3]] - vertices[v_i[5]];
00232       temp_vec[1] =((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00233       temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[2]] - vertices[v_i[5]];
00234       untangle_function_3d( mBeta, temp_vec, met_vals[5] );
00235     
00236       fval=average_metrics(met_vals, 6, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00237       break;
00238     default:
00239       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00240                        "Unsupported cell type (%ld) for Untangle quality metric.",
00241                        type);
00242 
00243 
00244       fval=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00245       return false;
00246   }// end switch over element type
00247   return true;
00248 }
